comment.author: 24101413@N03
comment._content: A mesmerising but horrific picture.  It's also surprisingly sharp for an image that must have been taken in great haste.

comment.author: 26887305@N00
comment._content: Wow, I remember that crash. Very sad day.

comment.author: 32990604@N05
comment._content: Was just at the crash site a few days ago with my son who lives just a few blocks away.  One open field overlooking the freeway with a chain link fence around it, and some slightly newer looking homes and apartments is about all you can see as you drive by to view.
